titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to eliminate the requirement that divorced wives' husbands must retire before divorced wives are eligible for annuity under the Act.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Transportation, Tourism, and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 10/15/1987--Introduced. Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to repeal the requirement that divorced wives' husbands must retire before such wives are eligible for an annuity under the Act.
